timeline.title: Start of the journey
timeline.event: It all started in my IT technical course at ETEC in Atibaia, where I was able to learn programming logic, OOP, hardware maintenance and website and application development.

timeline.title: First stage completed
timeline.event: I completed my first training, as a computer technician! For this, I developed a full-stack web project with PHP and MySQL.

timeline.title: Start of college
timeline.event: I started my degree at FATEC in Bragan√ßa Paulista. Over these three years, I was able to deepen my knowledge about programming, design patterns, hardware and IT governance.

timeline.title: First opportunity
timeline.event: I started working in the technology area, at the time as a software quality analyst, it was 6 months of a lot of learning.

timeline.title: Started as a developer
timeline.event: I started my journey as a developer. I worked at Quality Digital developing web applications with a focus on e-commerce, using VTEX and ReactJS as a base, applying design patterns and agile methodologies rites.

timeline.title: Systems Analyst
timeline.event: As an undergraduate project, I developed an application in React Native and NodeJS to manage internship vacancies and graduated as a Systems Analyst!

timeline.title: Jamstack and NextJS
timeline.event: I started working on Jamstack projects in VTEX's Headless architecture such as Plurix, Vivara stores and Tata supermarkets.

timeline.title: Getting to know Deco.cx
timeline.event: Working as a freelancer for the company Adaptio, I had my first contact with the Deco platform, developing a customized product page for the 'Aviator' store.

timeline.title: English course
timeline.event: I finished my first English course focused on conversation.

timeline.title: Web full-stack
timeline.event: I worked at the company dna360 as a web developer focused on the VTEX, Wake commerce and Deco.cx platforms.

timeline.title: Front-end Developer
timeline.event: Currently, I work as a developer for B8One, developing and maintaining robust projects in VTEX and Wake Commerce. My work ranges from implementing advanced and customized features and integrating complex solutions to continuously optimizing and evolving platforms to ensure performance, scalability, and an excellent user experience.
